sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SidenavService } from '../../services/sidenav.service'; import { ThemeService } from '../../services/theme.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { public darkTheme: Observable = new Observable(); constructor(public sidenavService: SidenavService, private themeService: ThemeService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.darkTheme = this.themeService._darkTheme$$; } toggleTheme(check: boolean): void { this.themeService.setTheme(check); } toggleSidenav() { this.sidenavService.toggle(); } }
